children.title: Changes
Electron app.
Unity3D manager app in StoryTime package to manage all data from one place!
Added CI/CD features for automated builds.
Fixes
Bug fixes
Changes
Quality of life updates.
Bug fixes.
Fixes
Bug fixes
Changes
Added node editor for craftable items.
Added events to the story node editor.
Server feature updates.
Fixes
Bug fixes
Changes
Readme updated with information about new databases support.
Ability to load firebase config from file..
Fixes
Bug fixes
Changes
Update to angular 10.
Fixes
Changes
Fixes
Stability fixes
Changes
Projects are shown now in two parts < 7 days or < 30 days.
Breadcrumbs links are updated en now displaying project name and table name instead of project id and table id.
Unity3D projects can refresh tokens by themself.
Update Nebular to 6.2.1.
Fixes
Update most dependencies to support angular 10.
Users can now receive the right invites.
Users are now able to send invites, accept and join projects.
Adding firebase auth to the dependencies.
Added commonJS dependencies for angular 10 support.
angular/fire update to latest version.
Update to old dependencies and also heading to get support for typescript 4.0.
Tables are able to load relations again.
Better user permissions for better security.
Changes
Snackbar functionality added and entirely functional. User is now able to call snackbar and undo changes if they want to.
Easier changelog configuration.
Snackbar functionality added and entirely functional. User is now able to call snackbar and undo changes if they want to.
Fixes
HOTFIX for getting relation data from other tables when they are not loaded in yet.
Changes
Add functionality to find users to add them to the project.
Fixes
FIX when projects object does not exist in user when making projects.
FIX that you can"t complete all the forms.
Fix for showing tables in the grid view.
Changes
Add functionality to find users to add them to the project.
Functionality added to let users (un)hide tables.
WIP Start of sidebar menu for projects. Give the user ability to quickly access projects.
Revision functionality finished. User is now able to return to older revisions when it comes to data.
Removed custom changelog setting from smart-table view.
Ability to change/delete relations. Relations are now moved to table settings.
All timestamps are now replaced with server timestamp of Firebase for better accuracy.
User is now able to return to older revisions when it comes to data.
Relations can now be viewed in table settings as well.
Possible to view revisions in the table settings.
Login UI changes & dynamic form changes.
Implementation of saving token to a directory chosen by the user.
Revamped the relations" functionality to work with the new data layout.
Implemented electron service to access the Electron API.
Integration of electron. Users can now physically download the app.
Fixed the relation data on one level. Still have to fix on multiple levels.
Tables can now be owned only by one project.
Table service to manage tables of the project.
Project service to manage projects.
Sub header is now able to act on projects or tables.
Users can make projects or tables now. Sorting will come later.
Lots of rearrangements for data management.
Fixes
FIX for invalid data when sending out invites.
FIX for not able to send out invites.
FIX for sending invites based on creation of entry in the database.
FIX of the Insert multiple rows where it previously crashed on a invalid form group.
FIX for when you load a different project that it keeps the old table data.
Other code fixes
Changes
We have refactored the whole system where as the user can now have multiple projects running.
We have made some backend progress where we minimize the amount of data collected for each query to Firebase.
Also with those changes, the users are now able to work on tables at the same time.
Fixes
No more to many queries
